channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Relatively deep pothole at entrance of pilley lane, 17th September
item.description:
Entrance of pilley lane by leckhampton road. Right by the junction near the new residential flats and houses.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Pilley Lane, Leckhampton, Cheltenham

item.title: There is a bed base dumped opposite 3 Cromwell Rd Cheltenham which is dangerous..it tips over and obstructs the pavement. It has been there at least a month. Most annoying..an eyesore., 17th September
item.description:
Next to the new townhouses opposite 3 Cromwell Rd Cheltenham.. it's damp and mouldy..heavy and dangerous..
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, Cromwell Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 17th September
item.description:
Cut back approx 3m of shrubs growing out of base of tree on roundabout centre - 28 days - Standard TM as space for gang to work safety on roundabout centre. (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is a Tesco shopping trolley in the next driveway to us ..has been dumped here which is annoying., 17th September
item.description:
The Tesco shopping trolley has been here a week. Tesco's is a long way from here... very annoying. We are 3 Cromwell Road Cheltenham. Also there is a big bed base going rotten and mildrew opposite us next to the modern townhouses. We have spoken to the neighbour ..he took away the bed stead but left the base. It's a danger because it falls down and obstructs the pavement opposite me when I take the dog for my a walk. Very annoying as it's been there for a month.... both trolley and bed base are an eyesore to the neighbourhood ....
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, Cromwell Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
